comprehensive_overview: Twisted is an event-driven networking engine written in Python. It supports multiple network protocols, including TCP, UDP, SSL/TLS, HTTP, IMAP, SSH, and more. Twisted is designed for scalability and to easily build networked applications.
core_features: 1. Support for multiple network protocols like TCP, UDP, SSL/TLS, HTTP, SSH, etc. 2. Event-driven programming model for asynchronous I/O operations. 3. Built-in implementations for common networking patterns like clients, servers, and protocols. 4. Ability to easily extend and customize functionality through a comprehensive plugin system.
